The main problem with the experiment is that the substances your using and mainly acidic. Its advanced chemistry but in a nut shell anything that is made up of petroleum or gasoline will dissolve acidic substances and give a coloured flame. Anything else mainly alkaline or basic and even strong salts like NaCl or KCl will not dissolve in petroleum hence you will burn the petroleum only and get the flame of the petroleum. Note in the last experiment you burnt the materials only that was the reason you were getti g coloured flames. Try changing the substances itll help alot with the coloures.
